name: Day 1: Kill all your pikmin before going to Alph's tutorial
Defeat Bulbear pre-Wing Onion in DT
Use the Koppad camera to view 10 Pikmin drawings
Get GoH Dusk Pustules without destroying the Electric Gates in the way
Defeat Burrowing Snagret without wings or bombs
Defeat the 3 TR Orange Bulborbs without bombs
Raise all(5) Climbing Sticks in the game
Early Blues Impossible: Go to Blue Onion before rescuing Louie
Collect all Scornet corpses dropped by the boss
Kill a Dwarf Bulborb without thowing
Finish the Plasm Wraith chase without winged Pikmin
